name: SciFlyr
description:
BUCKLE UP for this exciting, fast-paced, endless, minimalistic, flying game! Recklessly maneuver your craft along a futuristic 4-lane superhighway in the sky. Fly with and against oncoming traffic as you avoid obstacles.

EASY CONTROLS put you in the pilot seat with ease! In Settings, you can select:

• Swipe Up, Down, Left, Right, Diagonally (anywhere on screen)
• Virtual Joystick (left or right screen)
• Keyboard WSAD
• Keyboard Up, Down, Left, Right
• Mouse Click+Swipe Up, Down, Left, Right, Diagonally (anywhere on screen)

CUSTOMIZE YOUR GAMEPLAY for a unique experience each time you play:

GAME MODE: Play Button 1 > Fly fast, avoid obstacles and score points.

ZEN MODE: Play Button 2 > Fly fast and enjoy the “flow” as you avoid obstacles. Try it with the speeding wind soundtrack!

SOUNDTRACK: Play to a pulse-pounding music or to the natural sound of speeding wind.

COLOR: Choose a natural or psychedelic color scheme and select a wing color for your craft.
